about_the_game: A modern hacking simulator where you can choose your path as a Black Hat, White Hat, or Gray Hat hacker. The choices you make will directly impact your journey through the hacking world while also guiding you through complex puzzles and challenges.
detailed_description: A modern hacking simulator where you can choose your path as a Black Hat, White Hat, or Gray Hat hacker. The choices you make will directly impact your journey through the hacking world while also guiding you through complex puzzles and challenges.

Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: DotSec is a modern hacking simulator where you can choose your path as a Black Hat, White Hat, or Gray Hat hacker. The choices you make will directly impact your journey through the hacking world while also guiding you through complex puzzles and challenges.
